ISRO LPSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 23 Technical Assistant and Other Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 10:16 IST
 Indian Space Research Organisation
 23 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 19,900 to 142,400




FOLLOW

The Liquid Propulsion Systems Centre (ISRO LPSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 23 Technical Assistants, Technician, Sub Officer, Heavy Vehicle Driver A, and Light Vehicle Driver A Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, Diploma, ITI in Mechanical, Electronics Engineering can apply for the ISRO LPSC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Karnataka.

ISRO LPSC Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Technical Assistant	12	Diploma in Electronics, Mechanical Engineering
Sub Officer	01	Any Degree
Technician B	06	ITI, 10th pass
Heavy Vehicle Driver A	02	10th pass
Light Vehicle Driver A	02

ISRO LPSC Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

ISRO LPSC Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on 

Written Test.
Skill Test.

ISRO LPSC Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For Female/SC/ST/PWD candidates: NIL.
For all other candidates: Rs. 750/-.

ISRO LPSC Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 19,900/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 1,42,400/- per month.
How to Apply for the ISRO LPSC Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the ISRO LPSC Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	12-08-2025
Closing date	26-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
